Louis vuitton a renowned title in planet of Trend

The background of louis vuitton bag dates back to 1932, when company entered in the business of designing its bag, the very first bag manufactured by firm was Noe bag, which in reality was intended to carry out champagne bottles. Instantly immediately after that firm commenced designing bags for business objective the first ever bag designed with louis vuitton monogram was louis vuitton speedy which was manufactured in 1932 and is becoming manufactured and sold till date in Global market. It can be said that this bag set a benchmark for other variants of bags which were manufactured in the later on many years.

The main variants of <b>speedy louis vuitton </b> which are introduced for the spring summer season of 2011-2012 are Monogram Canvas, Damier Canvas ebene, Damier Azur Canvas, Monogram Vernis leather,Monogram multicolore, and several more which are capable of grabbing consideration of each customer with their very first look.
